seo.title: KudoSIM Business - Join Our Global Network
seo.description: Join KudoSIM's business program and earn up to 15% commission for every eSIM sale. Help travelers stay connected worldwide while growing your income.

hero.title: Welcome to
hero.subtitle: Join the most rewarding affiliate program in the travel industry

benefits.title: Why Join KudoSIM?
benefits.subtitle: Join the most rewarding affiliate program in the travel industry

commission.title: Generous Commissions
commission.description: Earn up to 15% commission on every sale. The more you sell, the higher your commission tier becomes!

setup.title: Quick Setup
setup.description: Get started in minutes with our easy-to-use platform. No technical knowledge required!

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our dedicated partner support team is always here to help you succeed.

rewards.title: Our love language is gift giving
rewards.subtitle: Enjoy exclusive rewards and benefits as a KudoPartner

flights.title: Free Flights
flights.description: Score free flights and other cool travel perks as you hit sales milestones.

events.title: Exclusive Events
events.description: Get invited to secret events and network with fellow partners.

features.title: First Access
features.description: Be the first to try new features and products before anyone else.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the KudoPartner program

eligible.question: Who can become a KudoPartner?
eligible.answer: Any business or individual with an audience interested in travel can join. This includes travel bloggers, agencies, content creators, and more.

payment.question: How do I get paid?
payment.answer: We process payments monthly via PayPal or bank transfer. You'll earn commission for every successful referral that results in a purchase.

commission.question: What's the commission structure?
commission.answer: Start earning 5% commission and increase up to 15% based on your sales performance. The more you sell, the higher your commission tier becomes!

tracking.question: How do I track my earnings?
tracking.answer: You'll get access to a comprehensive dashboard where you can track clicks, conversions, and earnings in real-time.

no.minimums.desc: No MOQ. Create an account, buy an eSIM and get started. Prices listed clearly, no hidden fees.
management.console.desc: Issue and manage eSIM plans to your team or your customers from our easy to use web console.
quick.start.desc: Buy a pre-built eSIM shop or add a No Code integration to your existing eCommerce platform.
api.access.desc: Create a custom sales experience with our API. Order, top up, and suspend eSIMs from our API.
powered.by.title: Powered by Redtea Mobile
powered.by.subtitle: a Leader in eSIM and Global Connectivity
endorsed.by.forbes: Endorsed by Forbes as one of the "100 Most Customer-Centric Companies".
data.coverage.title: Data coverage everywhere
data.coverage.subtitle: Benefit from our pricing power in over 100 countries and regions
large.small.title: Large and small, short and long
large.small.desc: We offer data for travelers in 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, 10GB and 20GB sizes. Additionally, we have the ability to customize plans, to suit your needs.
repeat.customers.title: Repeat Customers
repeat.customers.desc: Sell plans as single use or let users top up their existing installed eSIM with additional data.
single.multi.title: Single or multi country plans
single.multi.desc: We offer single country or as a multi-country data plans for people visiting more than one destination in a trip.
multiple.networks.title: Multiple Networks
multiple.networks.desc: We are working directly with global tier 1 operators, purchasing in bulk and offering you competitive rates.
